Question:
Look carefully for the pattern, and then choose which pair of numbers comes next.

9 12 11 14 13 16 15

A. 14 13
B. 18 21
C. 14 17
D. 12 13
E. 18 17
Solution: This is a simple alternating addition and subtraction series. First, 3 is added, then 1 is subtracted, then 3 is added, 1 subtracted, and so on.

Question:
Look carefully for the pattern, and then choose which pair of numbers comes next.

4 8 22 12 16 22 20 24

A. 28 32
B. 28 22
C. 22 28
D. 32 36
E. 22 26
Solution: This is an alternating repetition series, with a random number, 22, interpolated as every third number into an otherwise simple addition series. In the addition series, 4 is added to each number to arrive at the next number.

Question:
Look carefully for the pattern, and then choose which pair of numbers comes next.

40 40 31 31 22 22 13

A. 13 4
B. 13 5
C. 4 13
D. 9 4
E. 4 4
Solution: This is a subtraction series with repetition. Each number repeats itself and then decreases by 9.

Question:
Look carefully for the pattern, and then choose which pair of numbers comes next.

1 10 7 20 13 30 19

A. 26 40
B. 29 36
C. 40 25
D. 25 31
E. 40 50
Solution: Here, every other number follows a different pattern. In the first series, 6 is added to each number to arrive at the next. In the second series, 10 is added to each number to arrive at the next.

Question:
Look carefully for the pattern, and then choose which pair of numbers comes next.

10 20 25 35 40 50 55

A. 70 65
B. 60 70
C. 60 75
D. 60 65
E. 65 70
Solution: This is an alternating addition series, in which 10 is added, then 5, then 10, and so on.
